sentences.sContent: What festivals of atonement, what sacred games shall we have to invent?
sentences.sContent_eng: What festivals of atonement, what sacred games shall we have to invent?
sentences.sCn: 我们必须发明什么样的弥补仪式和神圣游戏？

remMethod.val: 来自atone(v. 弥补， 赎罪)

trans.tranOther: something you do to show that you are sorry for having done something wrong
